title: HR Management Practical Competency Enhancement: Peer Feedback Design Strategies for Academic Writing Skill Development

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Academic Writing Structures and Knowledge of Science Curriculum Content
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can design an anonymous peer feedback system that considers sociocultural contexts
Learners can modify and apply an academic writing feedback rubric tailored to the characteristics of science subjects
Learners can propose structured strategies to enhance the objectivity of feedback in digital environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
